show.name: Lx7.ca
show.description: A podcast about techno, music production, and the Detroit electronic music scene from 2006-2008.

episodes.title: Lx7 is BACK - Watch This Space
episodes.description: Shot-calling with a 'Watch This Space' vid. Lx7 Podcast is back!

episodes.title: Lx7 podvert
episodes.description: Look it's another wonderful podvert.... thought it would be jokes to share it...

episodes.title: Lx7#010 - Is classical music really techno.
episodes.description: What is techno? Ha,... such an easy question to answer... electronic music right? maybe not. Let me ask the question and give you something to think about.

episodes.title: Lx7#025 - Live PA'ing The MPC (How I did it)
episodes.description: In this video episode I do a follow-up to the previous episode LivePA. I share the process on how I put it together, and speak to the idea of standardizing the process.

episodes.title: Lx7#033 - Running The Beats In Record Mode
episodes.description: Some people are fans of programming their music to the nth degree, but sometimes working that way can bog down the creative process. I like to get in there and work.

episodes.title: Lx7#035 - DEMF, Aaron-Carl And Music Inspiration
episodes.description: Wondered what DEMF was like... for me it was a chance to hang out with friends and shoot some video. Having spent most of the event at the various kiosks I talked to Aaron-Carl.

episodes.title: Lx7#036 - DEMF, DJ Di'jital Oldschool Tracks and Samplers
episodes.description: When I first started visiting detroit I had a chance meeting with DJ Di'jital outside of Record Time. He had no idea who I was,... but for years after the chance meeting we kept in touch.

episodes.title: Lx7#037 - DEMF, Camera Chaos With Anthony Shakir And Claude
episodes.description: My attempts to spend some time with Anthony Shakir on camera seemed fraught with problems... every time I planned on interviewing him, he would disappear.

episodes.title: Lx7#038 - A NIN remix with the Butcher of Detroit
episodes.description: I've known Sean (The Butcher of Detroit) for ages from his visits up to Toronto to buy records and hang out for Carabana. So while I was in Detroit for DEMF, I stopped by his studio.

episodes.title: Lx7#039 - Theo Parrish do it cause you're _____...
episodes.description: I've been a fan of Theo Parrish since I first heard First Floor. I'd been traveling to Detroit buying pretty much anything that I found at Record Time that said Sound Signature.

episodes.title: Lx7#040 - A Short Visual History of EDM Hardware
episodes.description: At Beats Breaks and Culture, Play De Record sponsored a gallery installation that tracked some of the hardware used to make electronic music.

episodes.title: Lx7#041 - The End of my Studio 1
episodes.description: This episode is a goodbye to my current studio, but the Lx7 podcast is not over. It's been a summer of planning, for season 3 of the show. After 2 years of weekly episodes.
